author: brane
msg: Make bdb_env_t private to the implementation, and introduce
bdb_env_baton_t whose lifetime is the same as the lifetime of an
svn_fs_t, so that correct reference counting can be guaranteed by
(bdb_env_t): Move definition to bdb/env.c, replace with opaque typedef.
(ndb_env_baton_t): New. Use instead of bdb_env_t everywhere outside
(bdb_env_t): Replace fields pending_errors and user_callback with
new field error_info. Update all uses and docstrings.
(convert_bdb_error): New. Use everywhere instead of SVN_BDB_ERR and
* bdb/bdb-err.h, bdb/bdb-err.c: Use bdb_env_baton_t instead of bdb_env_t.
* fs.h (base_fs_data_t): Change type of field 'bdb' to bdb_env_baton_t.
* fs.c: Use bdb_env_baton_t instead of bdb_env_t everywhere.
instead of directly manipulating the panic flag.
(open_databases): Register the svn_fs_t cleanup after opening the
environment, so that the cleanups are run in the correct order.

author: fitz
msg: Bring the DAV Security Space survey up to date.  Also, finally add the
script that makes the pretty picture so that anyone can do this
* tools/dev/graph-dav-servers.py: New script for generating the above .png.

author: dlr
msg: Fix JavaHL compile error with Visual Studio 2005.
prevent a data type mismatch error from VS2005.
